name: ListDefinedWebhooks
description:
Retrieve all webhooks for your application.

Used to get all webhooks defined for files or folders owned by the authenticated user. Note: Admins can't see webhooks created by service accounts unless they have access to those folders.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: The position marker to start returning results from. Required for marker-based pagination with `usemarker` set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: maximum_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of webhooks to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
